Tigerlily

Artist

Tigerlily is one of Australia’s premier producers and DJs. With 10 years of experience and over 1.2 million social media followers, she’s proved herself to be a versatile, ever-evolving artist with a focus on driving the Australian electronic scene forward. Voted Australia’s #1 Female DJ three years in a row, Tigerlily is one of the most in-demand artists. She's played some of the most esteemed clubs from Las Vegas’ Hakkasan and Seoul’s Club Octagon, to the world’s biggest festivals including Ultra and Tomorrowland. When she’s not performing on the Main Stage, you can find Tigerlily spinning for global brands such as Amazon Prime, The Grand Prix, Samsung, Women’s Health, Australian Open and JBL.
